claims.text:
DISCHARGE SUMMARY
Patient: Linda Johnson, 82 y/o female
MRN: 356787

PAST MEDICAL HISTORY:
- Atrial Fibrillation
- Systemic Lupus Erythematosus

MEDICATIONS ON ADMISSION:
- Metformin 1000mg PO twice daily
- Lisinopril 20mg PO daily
- Omeprazole 20mg PO daily
- Prednisone 20mg PO daily
- Furosemide 40mg PO daily

LABORATORY VALUES:
- Sodium: 138 mEq/L (ref: 136-145)
- WBC: 12.4 x10^3/uL (ref: 4.5-11.0)
- BNP: 450 pg/mL (ref: <100)
- HbA1c: 7.2 % (ref: <5.7 normal)
- Hemoglobin: 10.2 g/dL (ref: 12.0-17.5)
- Albumin: 3.8 g/dL (ref: 3.5-5.5)
- Creatinine: 1.8 mg/dL (ref: 0.7-1.3)
- Bicarbonate: 24 mEq/L (ref: 22-29)

VITAL SIGNS ON DISCHARGE:
- BP: 133/84 mmHg
- HR: 72 bpm
- RR: 22 breaths/min
- Temp: 99.1 F
- SpO2: 98%

DISCHARGE DIAGNOSES:
1.
